definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column

sentences.english: Conclusions Complete resection of tumor is the most effective way to manage sacrum chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 结论骶骨脊索瘤的最佳治疗为广泛的手术切除。

sentences.english: Then lengthen your tailbone and sacrum as your thighbones descend toward your hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 然后，拉伸你的尾骨和骶骨，大腿骨沉向腿筋。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze biomechanical property of three methods of sacral screw.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究三种骶骨螺钉植入法的生物力学性能。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the morphologic characters of the sacral foramina for providing anatomic foundation for operation on the sacrum.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察骶孔形态特征，为骶骨手术提供解剖学依据。

sentences.english: A woman's anatomy allows one less sacral segment to lock with the pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 女性的生理构造中，骶骨与骨盆的连结比男性少一点。

sentences.english: There were many variations in sacrums with accessory auricular surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 发生副耳状面的骶骨有较多的变异。

sentences.english: Remember that sitting in and of itself "unlocks" the sacrum and the ilium.
sentences.chinese: 记住，坐式本身就会打开骶骨和髂骨之间的“锁”。

sentences.english: Oerall, 4 cases of a solitary osteochondroma located in the sacrum hae been reported.
sentences.chinese: 至今总共有4篇有关骶骨孤立骨软骨瘤的报告。

sentences.english: Primary tumor in the sacrococcygeal region is unusual.
sentences.chinese: 原发性骶骨部肿瘤较少见。

sentences.english: Najash retained a sacrum, a bony feature that supported the pelvis.
sentences.chinese: Najash蛇保留着骶骨，用它来支撑骨盆。

sentences.english: Imagine that the sacrum is sinking deeper into the back of your pelvis and bring the tailbone closer to the pubis.
sentences.chinese: 想像骶骨下沉进入骨盆的后侧并带着尾骨靠近耻骨。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the efficacy of tumor resection or curettage for sacral chordoma through the anterior-posterior combined approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍原发性骶骨脊索瘤手术治疗的初步经验。
骶骨骨折了该注意些什么？

sentences.english: The most powerful healer is simply not to create the torque of sacrum and ilium moving apart.
sentences.chinese: 最有效地治疗就是避免引起骶骨和髂骨分离的扭动。

sentences.english: This pain can be caused by the sacrum either slipping forward or backward in relationship to the ilium.
sentences.chinese: 原因可能是骶骨相对于髂骨向前或向后脱位。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical methods of sacral chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骶骨脊索瘤的外科治疗方法。

definition: ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
sacrum (bone at the base of the spine)
